message.body: Is it ok to show your apt tomorrow, Wed, at noon?
I forgot to tell you, I gave you a great reference last week to a landlord who was calling about you and Ria. You've been great at Orangina and Ria has been great at Pinky.
Excellent, thanks Stu. And showing oringina is fine with me as long as the other folks know
Sounds good. Did you get the apt?
